daily_activities: Adventure Sports: Elephant Safari at Amber Fort
Dining: Lunch at a local restaurant to try traditional Rajasthani cuisine
Museums: Visit the Albert Hall Museum
Shopping: Explore the Johari Bazaar for jewelry and handicrafts
Nightlife: Enjoy cocktails at a rooftop bar with a view of the city
Hiking: Trek to the Nahargarh Fort for panoramic views of Jaipur
Sightseeing: Visit the Jal Mahal and Hawa Mahal
Dining: Dinner at a restaurant serving traditional Indian cuisine
Sightseeing: Visit the City Palace and Jantar Mantar
Adventure Sports: Hot Air Balloon ride over Jaipur
Shopping: Visit the Bapu Bazaar for souvenirs and local goods

travel_instructions.estimated_travel_time: 1 hour by flight, 6-7 hours by train, 7-8 hours by car
travel_instructions.route_details: By car: Take NH48 from Ahmedabad to Jaipur, with a possible stop at Udaipur or Ajmer. By train: Take a train from Ahmedabad Junction to Jaipur Junction. By flight: Take a flight from Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport (AMD) to Jaipur International Airport (JAI)
